nodes.text: Piikow was a Chadra-Fan male who operated as a technician for the Dreamers, a successor group to Saw Gerrera's partisans. In 0 ABY, shortly after the Battle of Yavin, Piikow worked at the Dreamers' encampment on the planet Jeosyn, and he became friends with Del Farren, a new recruit. However, Farren was actually Del Meeko, one of four undercover operatives of the Imperial Special Forces group known as Inferno Squad. In the following months, the double-agents of Inferno Squad killed the Dreamers, including Piikow. Despite serving Inferno Squad, Meeko regretted the Chadra-Fan's death.
